results.content:
so the reason i gave 2 starts
1.no resource for the code
2.when asked a question and requesting to get the source code because instructor couldn't see the problem why my code is not working and I am still waiting it is almost after 2 weeks .
I think the instructor understands what he is teaching but it is very hard to learn like this without sources cause i am really this with this course almost at the end of it very disappointing
